<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Replace a call to the specified intrinsic function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If an intrinsic function must be implemented by the code generator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (such as va&#95;start), this function should print a message and abort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Otherwise, if an intrinsic function call can be lowered, the code to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implement it (often a call to a non-intrinsic function) is inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#95;after&#95; the call instruction and the call is deleted. The caller must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// be capable of handling this kind of change.</span></CodeLine>
